<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/gujarat-tour-packages" title="Gujarat Tour Packages">Gujarat</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Dwarka Somnath Tour Package</span></span> </p>

<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c2df4bfd6b4_64701970" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">

<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/dwarka-somnath.jpg" alt="Dwarka Somnath Tour Package" title="Dwarka Somnath Tour" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>Our beautifully tailored 5 Nights and 6 Days long Dwarka Somnath Tour Package is designed to make you feel spiritually inclined in the land of Lord Shiva and Lord Krishna. Pay your visit at Dwarkadhish Temple which is one of the most important pilgrimages in Char Dham pilgrimage circuit in India and seek the blessing of Lord Krishna to bless you with loads of happiness and love in your life. Somnath Temple which is dedicated to Lord Moon is one of the most prime destinations of Shiva worshippers and is reckoned as one of the major Jyotirlingas in India.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Dwarka Somnath Tour Package Itinerary</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span> Arrival in Ahmedabad</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Welcome to Dwarka Somnath Tour Itinerary! On your arrival at the Ahmedabad Airport, our tour representative will greet you and will assist you in boarding the waiting room. Ahmedabad is believed to serve as the capital city of Gujarat once and is also renowned as the largest city in this westernmost state of India. Your tour with Namaste India Trip starts with visiting the sightseeing destinations in Ahmedabad and Calico Museum of Textiles is the first destination to be explored. The museum is located in the vicinity of the Lalbhai located in the Shahibaug area. After the museum proceed towards Vasna Vishala Hotel where you can visit the Utensils museum. And then proceed towards the last sightseeing destination of the day i.e. Jama Masjid which is popular for its grandeur architecture and serene and tranquil ambiance. It’s time to savor yourself with the mouth-watering Gujarati cuisines and after enjoying the afternoon meal rest for some time and then move towards the popular shopping areas in the city. You must be feeling less energetic now so return to the hotel for dinner and then overnight stay.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Ahmedabad - Rajkot</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Start your day with a hearty breakfast including Gujarati style snacks. If you are done with your breakfast then get ready to drive for a 4-hour long journey to reach Rajkot. Upon your arrival in Rajkot, check-in to the hotel room, freshen up and get ready to start exploring the sightseeing attractions of Rajkot. Make your first visit at Kaba Gandhi No Delo which is believed to be the place where Mahatma Gandhi had spent his childhood and is now serving as a museum. Next, drive towards the Watson Museum and Bhomeshwar Temple and get some different and enriching experience. This is how the sightseeing tour of the day concludes here and in the evening you are free to spend leisure the way you wish to. In the evening stroll down the streets of market places and shop out some pieces of souvenirs to bring back home. Also, savor the delectable Kathiawadi Cuisine selling out in the markets and then after completing shopping return to the hotel for dinner followed by a relaxing overnight stay in the cozy hotel room.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Rajkot - Dwarka</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>You will be served with Fafda, Jalebi, and Gathiya at breakfast. Post breakfast check-out from the hotel and drive towards Dwarka which is world-wide reckoned as the land of Lord Krishna. On reaching the holy city in Gujarat complete the check-in formalities. Loosen up yourself, freshen up and move out to explore the beauty of the nearby areas. However, there is no particular schedule of the day so if you want to relax in the cozy hotel room then you are free to do so.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Dwarka Sightseeing</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Wake up little morning today and then savor yourself with a relishing breakfast. Get ready and join us on exploring the major wonders of the city and Dwarkadhish Temple is one of the most important ones. After paying homage at the Dwarkadhish Temple proceed towards the other majestic shrine of the city Rukmini Temple which is devoted to Rukmini (wife of Lord Krishna). It’s time to get some different experience besides spiritual experience so you will drive towards Beyt Dwarka Beach to get some revitalizing and rejuvenating experience. Later drive towards the popular Shankhadhar Island which boasts a good number of aquatic species and is adorned with appealing surreal scenic vistas. After completing a fun-filled day return to the hotel for delectable dinner and a comfortable overnight stay in the cozy hotel room.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 5 :</span>Dwarka - Porbandar - Somnath</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>On the 5th day of the journey, you are scheduled to drive towards Somnath which is at a driving distance of approx. 230 kilometers. While driving towards Somnath, visit Porbandar which holds great importance in Gujarat Tourism as it is believed to be the place where Mahatma Gandhi was born. Also, visit the popular Kirti Mandir and Sudama Mandir which is dedicated to Lord Krishna’s best friend named Sudama. After enjoying the afternoon meal continue your drive towards Somnath which is one of the most important pilgrimage sites in India. On your arrival at Somnath, you will be transferred to the pre-booked hotel check-into the hotel room and head towards Somnath (one of the most important Jyotirlingas). This huge ancient temple is believed to be plundered and attacked by Muslim invaders various times but the best thing is that it has been renovated beautifully each time. Do not miss out the chance to participate in the grand evening Aarti ceremony here which leaves the devotees filled with soul-lifting experience.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 6 :</span>Somnath - Ahmedabad</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Post savoring the relishing breakfast, drive towards Ahmedabad from where you will board the transport for your onward journey way to home. After completing the check-in formalities at the airport, our tour representative bids adieu as your journey with us concludes here.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How Many Days Are Required For A Complete Tour Of Dwarka And Somnath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> 4 to 5 days are enough to travel to Dwarka Somnath.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is There An Airport In Somnath?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> There is no airport in Somnath but it is connected to multiple cities via the aerodrome present at Diu.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> How Far Is Somnath From Dwarka?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">

</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Is There Any Dress Code For Somnath Temple?</div>
